item.title: Cutting Turf
item.description: Like many working class families, we used to cut turf for our fires in the winter. A visit to an old peat bog brings back some childhood memories…

item.title: Romance and heartbreak at Ceoffin Castle
item.description: On the Isle of Lismore, far off the beaten track, is the shambling ruin of Castle Ceoffin. It resembles, more than anything, a gnarled, groping hand reaching skyward.
